resources.string:
Thanks to everyone who has donated Your support is appreciated and helps support the app.
 See http://www.cadpage.org/financial-support for more details
 
 Coming soon. Pages dispatched through CodeMessaging can be delivered without incurring text messaging fees. And received on Android tablets. Stay tuned for further details
 
 What"'"s new in this release
 
 If your text pages include the incident date/time, and the parser for that location has been updated to parse them out, Cadpage will report that date/time instead of the time the text page was received. It will take us a while to retrofit this capability in all of our current location parsers. If we do not have it in yours, let us know and we will make changing it a priority.
 
 New Locations:
 Marion County, IN
 Yarmouth County, MA
 Englewood, OH
 Cabell County, WV
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 New Castle County, DE
 Allegany County, MD
 Cattaraugus County, NY
 Orange County, NC
 Delaware County, PA
 Erie County, PA
 Montgomery County, TX
 Nueces County, TX
 Franklin County, VA
 Louisa County, VA
 Prince William County, VA
